commits.message:
Implemented EUCA-10476, EUCA-12768, EUCA-10467, EUCA-10463, EUCA-10464, EUCA-10472, EUCA-12767.

EUCA-10476 added code to implement 'ChangeMessageVisibility' SQS API call.

EUCA-10467 Implemented GetQueueAttributes and SetQueueAttributes SQS API call.  Added additional error checking for Attribute Names in
GetQueueAttributes, SetQueueAttributes, and CreateQueue calls.

Added range checks on 'receiveMessage', to deal with DelaySeconds, MessageRetentionPeriod, and VisibilityTimeout.  In addition,
set the new 'visibleTimeout' value on a message after 'ReceiveMessage' is called.  This required .ge and .le restrictions in the Entities
types, so this was added as well.  These changes implemented EUCA-10463 (Visibility Timeout), EUCA-10464 (Message Delay), and EUCA-12767 (MessageRetentionPeriod).

EUCA-12768 Implemented 'GetQueueUrl' SQS API call.

EUCA-10472 Implemented logic to count messages in each type (delayed, visible, invisible) for ReadOnly Attributes, as well as set the other read only fields.

Refactored the Persistence API, requiring queue objects for Message API calls.

Converted all timestamps in the database to 'seconds' to match AWS.

Added several constants, removed Enums that were being used as constants.  (Simplified things).

Converted persistence mechanism to use the 'new' way to do entities.
